Package org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting

Provides a classes that can paint the map, route and marked points into a graphics-context

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IPaintVisitor A PaintVisitor is capable of drawing the map.
 

Class Summary
BasePaintVisitor The BasePaintVisitor simplifies the development of custom PaintVisitors.
BasePaintVisitor.AreaStyle This class encapsulates a dawing-style for a filled area.
BasePaintVisitor.BorderedStyle This class encapsulates a dawing-style for a road that is to be drawn with a border.
BasePaintVisitor.Style This class encapsulates a dawing-style for a road.
ColorHelper Helper to convert from color to html string and back.
ODRPaintVisitor Project: osmnavigation
ODRPaintVisitor.java
created: 09.12.2007 07:23:00


PaintVisitor similar to SimplePaintVisitor that draws nicer output.
SimplePaintVisitor A visitor that paint a simple scheme of every primitive it visits to a previous set graphic environment.
SmoothTilePainter A reimplementation of TilePaintVisitor that (down)loads tiles asynchronously.
TilePaintVisitor  
 

Enum Summary
ODRPaintVisitor.NODETYPE (c) 2007 by ODRPaintVisitor.WAY_TYPE Project: osmnavigation
ODRPaintVisitor.java
created: 09.12.2007 08:16:55


The types of ways we know how to draw.
 

Package org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting Description

Provides a classes that can paint the map, route and marked points into a graphics-context.
